name.baseName: 废旧光伏组件拆解;废旧光伏组件;手工拆解

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The edge of aluminum frame is first cut at the recycling process. Plastic parts separated fromcables are afterwards treated. The waste panels without frameand cable are introduced into a glass separation process.
铝框的边缘在回收过程中首先被切割。从电缆中分离出来的塑料件需要进行后续处理。没有框架和电缆的废面板被引入玻璃分离过程。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The mentioned industrial process is intended for the recycling of end-of-life photovoltaic (PV) modules. Specifically, it involves the mechanical disassembly of multi-Si PV components, where the aluminum frames are cut, plastic parts from cables are separated for further processing, and the remaining waste panels are subjected to glass separation. This process is essential for material recovery and supports the sustainable end-of-life management of photovoltaic systems, ultimately serving the growing renewable energy industry.
这个工业过程是为了回收废旧光伏组件而设计的。具体来说，它包括多硅光伏组件的手工拆解，其中铝框会先被切割，电缆中的塑料件需要分离出来并进行进一步处理，其余无框架和电缆的废旧面板将进入玻璃分离过程。这一过程对材料的回收至关重要，支持光伏系统可持续的生命周期管理，最终服务于不断增长的可再生能源行业。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of the multi-Si PV modules are collected from several sources: (1) Literatures including Fu (2013), which contain material inventory of several photovoltaic enterprises in Jiangsu province; Diao and Shi (2011), which contain material inventory of two photovoltaic enterprises in Beijing; He (2013), which contain material inventory of four photovoltaic enterprises in Gansu and Sichuan province. (2) Environment Impact Assessment Statements (EIAS) of multi-Si PV production companies from Sichuan (EIAS-Sichuan, 2008), Henan (EIAS-Henan, 2009) and Chongqing (EIAS-Chongqing, 2008). (3) Industry report of market foresight and investment prospect for China’s photovoltaic development (2014) and Industrial report of market foresight and investment prospect for China’s polysilicon development (2014). The mean value is applied when there are different data sources for specific materials.

多硅光伏组件的库存数据来源于多个来源:(1)Fu(2013)等文献，其中包含江苏省多家光伏企业的材料库存;Diao和Shi(2011)，其中包含北京两家光伏企业的材料库存;He(2013)，其中包含甘肃和四川四家光伏企业的材料库存。(2)四川(环评-四川，2008)、河南(环评-河南，2009)和重庆(环评-重庆，2008)多硅光伏生产企业环境影响评价报告(eia)。(3)《中国光伏发展市场前瞻与投资展望行业报告(2014)》和《中国多晶硅发展市场前瞻与投资展望行业报告(2014)》。当特定材料有不同的数据源时，应用平均值。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Huang, B. et al. Environmental influence assessment of China’s multi-crystalline silicon (multi-Si) photovoltaic modules considering recycling process. Solar Energy 143, 132–141 (2017).
Huang, B. et al. Environmental influence assessment of China’s multi-crystalline silicon (multi-Si) photovoltaic modules considering recycling process. Solar Energy 143, 132–141 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the life cycle assessment data of this industrial process, it is critical to consider the average values provided from the different sources for particular materials to ensure accurate representation of the multi-Si PV module recycling process. Methodological attention should be given to the inclusion of data from various Environmental Impact Assessment Statements (EIAS) and industry reports to capture the full scope of material inventory from different PV enterprises. This data should be integrated carefully into the broader context of PV recycling and environmental sustainability assessments.
在使用此工业过程的生命周期评估数据时，必须考虑不同材料来源提供的平均值，以确保对多硅光伏组件回收过程的准确表示。在方法上应关注包括来自多个环境影响评价报告（EIAS）和行业报告的数据以捕捉来自不同光伏企业的完整材料库存。这些数据应谨慎地融合到光伏回收和环境可持续性评估的更广泛背景中。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer,Ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer,Ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer
